title: What research on coronavirus structure can tell us about how to kill it - Washington Post
description: What research on coronavirus structure can tell us about how to kill it Washington Post How long does coronavirus live on certain surfaces? fox4kc.com The coronavirus isn’t alive. That’s why it’s so hard to kill. Boston.com How does the new coronavirus spread…
content:
SARS-CoV-2
Researchers hope that a new visualization of the architecture of SARS-CoV-2 will show them how to defeat it. 
The Washington Post is providing this story for free so that all readers have access to this important information about the coronavirus… [+5326 chars]
